entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Global Key Hooks - Keyboard class or DependencyService #3739

Closed

  • [Bug] Handler not found for view Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.RelativeLayout #3006
  • [Bug] `Handler not found for view Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility.AbsoluteLayout` exception occur when using AbsoluteLayout #2062

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Android, iOS] Implement IsTextPredictionEnabled property in SearchBar #3713
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Register compatibilty handlers for RelativeLayout and AbsoluteLayout #3723
    area/layout 🔲
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3721
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Hide maui templates in VS 17.0 and lower #3734
    area/templates 📄
  • Added Shell Page dependency resolution with DataTemplate and Shell global routes… #3375
    community ✨
  • Essentials fix DeviceDisplay and DeviceInfo #3738
    area/essentials 🍞
